name: 謝瑩奕
objective:
介紹產品設計初期形成設計策略所必需了解的美學、機能及工程等因素，並講授產品分析之基本理論與方法。藉由實際案例的說明與練習使學習者體會產品分析之方法並討論分析結果之意涵。
This course aims to provide the student with theories and methods of product analysis, which is one of the major sources of understanding the design of esthetic, functional and engineering details in one specific product group. Case study will be carried out with implication of the results discussed followed by practical exercise in analysing a specific group of product.
